inn1.comm: starts off with a wide, good length outside off stump and swinging away, left alone
down the leg side this time, swinging further down
appeal for caught behind, that pitched on a good length outside off and came in, Masakadza tried to defend on the front foot, deflected off his front pad to the keeper
Zimbabwe, that was bowled short of a good length outside off, guided to third man, first runs off the bat
back of a length on the off stump, presents the full face of the bat and defends it back to the bowler
shot! that was full on the pads, executes a beautiful on-drive between square leg and mid-wicket for Zimbabwe's first boundary. Good start for Sibanda here
short of a good length on the off stump, defended watchfully to cover
full on the pads this time, tries to flick it away, misses, will be disappointed about not having dispatched that one
short and wide, there to cut, Masakadza tries to do just that but misses
good length on the off stump and came back in prodigiously, strikes Masakadza high on the pads as he tries to defend on the back foot, the Sri Lankans appeal but was struck too high
Kulasekara follows Maharoof's lead here, bowls a wide down the leg side
back of a length on the off stump and angling in, punched to cover off the back foot
good length outside off and angling in, left alone this time
full outside off and leaving the right hander, comes down the track and drives it uppishly on the bounce to mid off
back of a length outside off and moving in, shoulders arms

gone!! That was pitched on a good length outside off and swinging away, comes forward and tries to defend  it on the off side, gets a thick outside edge and Sangakkara dives to his right to take a good, neat catch. One down!
back of a length on the off stump, defended off the back foot towards cover
back of a length outside off stump and swinging in, watches it to the keeper
good length on middle and leg, clipped away off the pads wide of square leg for a couple
full on the pads, glanced down to fine leg
good length outside the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
back of a length outside off and coming in, tries to cut, misses
good length on middle and leg, tries to fend it off his pads, deflects off the pads towards square leg for a leg bye
fuller this time, pitches on middle and swinging down leg, tries to drive it to mid-on, misses
good length outside off, held its line this time, defended to cover
full outside off, inducing the batsman to drive, but Masakadza is cautious enough to let it go to the keeper
full on middle and leg, swinging in, tries to drive it towards mid on, gets an inside edge onto his pads and the ball lobs up onto the on-side
good length on the off stump, holding its line, defended on the front foot
back of a length outside off and swinging away, tries to play at it but withdraws at the last moment
back of a length on the off stump and swinging away this time, tries tio upper-cut that towards third man,  misses
back of  a length on the off stump, holding its line, defended off the back foot
back of a length again, defended comfortably
short and wide, Chibhabha cashes in, cuts that fiercely between cover and point for his first boundary
good length outside off, pushed to mid off
fuller on middle and angling down leg, comes forward and tries to drive it on the up wide of mid off, misses, and is struck high on the pads
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully back to the bowler
good length outside off and swinging away, the batsman has nothing to do with it
full on middle and swinging down leg, tries to defend on the front foot but is truck low on the pads, that was going down leg
full outside the off stump, lets it go to the keeper

gone! Maharoof strikes! back of a length outside off and angling away, Chibhaha gets on the back foot and tries to run it down to third man, gets a thick outside edge and Kapugedara at second slip takes a regulation chance.
short of a good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
good length on middle and leg, Taibu comes forward and pushes it short of mid off for a quick single
back of a length on middle, defended back to the bowler
good length on the off stump, pushed to point
good length on the off stump, opens the face to run it down to third man for a single
good length on the off stump, defended to point on the front foot
full on the off stump, pushed wide of mid off
full on the off stump and swinging in, driven confidently to mid off
short of a good length outside off, pushed firmly to point
full on the off stump, Taibu defends it back to the bowler off the front foot

deceived by the swing there, good length outside off, Taibu anticipated an in-swinger and went on the back foot to defend it towards the bowler, the ball swings away and gets to the keeper on the bounce
back of a length on the off stump, defended towards cover

Zimbabwe are sliding here! that was bowled back of a length on the off stump and swinging away, Masakdza prods at it with absolutely no foot movement, gets a thin edge to Sangakkara who makes no mistake. Three down and Zimbabwe flounder after opting to bat first
good length on the off stump, dropped onto the leg side, thinks of a single, but wisely decides against it
beaten! that was a beautiful out swinger pitching on the off stump and leaving the right hander just as he tried to defend
and again! that was bowled on a good length on the off stump and swung away as Matsinkeyeri tried to push at it off the back foot
Maharoof is varying his swing here! that one came in, pitching on the off and swinging towards middle and leg, Matsinkineryi, rather awkwardly, drops it onto the leg side
full outside the off stump and swinging in, left alone
full outside the off stump, Taibu gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
good length on the off stump and swinging in, defended on the off side
full on middle and leg, dropped onto the leg side for a quick single, but is prevented by an alert mid wicket fielder who rushes in
full outside off and swinging away, left alone, that was quite wide, but is not given
good length outside the off stump, swinging away, shoulders arms
shot! short of a good length outside off, wide enough for Matsinkeyer to cut it past point for his first boundary
good length outside off and swinging away, Matsikenyeri leaves it alone
back of a length outside off, Matsinkenyeri stands tall and runs it down to third man for a single
good length on the off stump and leaving the right hander, chopped down to point
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully
slightly short of a good length outside off, left alone to the keeper. Taibu playing the patient game here
bouncer! bowled short on middle and leg, Matsinkenyeri ducks under it, and didn't look all too comfortable while doing so
full outside the off, inducing the batsman into the drive, hits the inside half of the bat and rolls down wide of mid on for a single
good length outside off, left alone by Taibu
full on the off stump and swinging into Taibu, drives it firmly to mid on
full outside the off, gets on the front foot and opens the face at the last moment to guide it wide of a diving point for a well run couple
full outside off, in the slot for an expansive drive through the covers, Taibu fails to find the gap
full outside leg stump and swinging down
good comeback! that was bowled on a good length outside off and beat Taibu as he tried to prod at it
short and wide outside off, there to cut, Matsinkenyeir doesn't waste the chance, slashes it uppishly, wide of a diving point for a boundary

gone!! poor shot! that was full outside the off stump, Matsikenyeri tried to drive it on the up wide of the bowler, ended up hitting it straight ti a shortish mid-on, where Thushara takes it a little awkwardly, but completes the catch nevertheless. Zimbabwe in trouble here, they are four down now
good length on the off stump and leaving the right hander, left alone
back of a length outside the off stump, left alone
full on the off stump, defended to cover
good length outside off, kept really low, Taibu tried to cut at it but could not get the bat down in time, Would have been interesting had that pitched on the stumps
good length outside off, Taibu shoulders arms, good carry to the keeper this time
bowled on a full length on middle and leg, driven to mid on
full outside off and swinging in, left alone to the keeper
good length on the off stump, defended to cover
good length outside off and coming in, tries to play it on the back foot with bat close to pad, struck on the pads but outside the line
good length outside off, holding its line, left alone
fuller outside the off stump and swinging away, shoulders arms
good length outside off and leaving the right hander, left alone
similar ball, similar result, Chigumbura in no hurry here
full outside off, gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
an off spinner pitching the oiff stump, Taibu sweeps him right away to short-fine leg
going the other way this time! pitches full on the middle stump and spinning towards off, defended
fuller on the off stump this time, pushed wide of cover
flighted outside off and spinning in, tries to drive it past silly point, gets a thick inside edge wide of the bowler
tossed up on middle and off, driven firmly to mid off
spinning away from the right hander this time, bowled on middle and leg, the batsman picks it though and defends it on the off side
good length outside off, left alone
fuller outside the off stump, shoulders arms yet again
good length on the off yet again, leaves it to the keeper
pushed wide of cover for a single
outside the off, left alone
outside off again, much wider, left alone
flatter outside off and spinning in, pushed to the on side
good shot! that was flat and slightly short outside off, punched wide of mid off for a couple
he's handling Mendis well here, slightly fuller in length this time on middle and leg, swept really square, wide of fine-leg for a couple
and again! that was tossed up on middle and leg, swept uppishly wide of fine leg, much finer this time, for a couple more
good sensible batting, tossed up outside off, driven down to long on for a single
flighted outside off stump, driven straight to mid off where a misfield allows Chigumbura to get off the mark
back of a length outside off and swinging away, left alone to the keeper
short and wide, there to cut, but Chigumbura fails to connect. Cannot miss such scoring opportunities when there have so few today
wide down the leg side
back of a length outside off, almost a bouncer, a harmless one though as Chigumbura watches it through to the keeper
good length on middle and off and swinging in, tries to work it away towards mid wicket, but is truck high on the pads, the appeal is turned down as it was going above the stumps
good length on middle and off, defended watchfully back to the bowler
fuller outside off, left alone to the keeper this time

gone!! bowled 'im!! that went straight on, bowled with a flatter trajectory on middle stump, Taibu anticipating an off spinner tried to work it away towards square leg, but the ball held its line, missed Taibu's bat, and crashed into middle and off stump.
flat outside off, defended as pitches on a good length
tossed up on middle and leg this time, defended watchfully
beaten by an off spinner, pitches on a good length on the off stump and spins away just as he tries to defend on the front foot
flighted on middle and off, pushed onto the off side
bowled flatter this time, pitching sahort of a good length on the off stump and spinning away prodigiously, left alone by Williams
back of a length on the off stump and swinging away, left alone
good length outside off, no swing there, left alone
back of a length outside off, left alone.
good length outside off, left alone.
full on the pads, flicked away to fine leg. Now you can't leave that alone!
full on the off stump and swinging into the left hander, defended onto the off side
flighted on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long on
turns away after pitching, pitches on a good length outside off, left alone

flighted outside off, Williams comes forward to defend, spins away at just the last moment, Sangakkara takes off the bails and appeals for a stumping, Williams' foot appears to be on the line but he seems to have dragged it back in just in time.
short of a length outside off, worked away towards fine leg

gone! that was pitched on a good length on middle stump, held its line, Chigumbura expecting it to spin towards him, tries to drive it back to the bowler, but the ball goes straight on and strikes his back pad, hits him in line with middle stump, and a delayed appeal by Mendis is upheld by Aleem Dar
fuller on middle and leg, and spinning down leg, tries to defend it on the front foot, strikes his pads, but that was going down
back of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, pushed to point
full outside off, left alone
dropped,full outside off and swinging away, tries to drive it wide of mid off, gets a thick outside edge but Jayawardene at first slip drops it while diving to his right
good length outside off stump, defended on the front foot

gone!! We seem to be heading for another early finish here! that was bowled on a good length outside off and leaving the right hander, comes forward to defend but gets a thin outside edge to Sangakkara who takes the easiest of catches
flighted on middle and off, defended to cover
beaten by the off spinner! pitches on a good length on the off stump, inducing Williams to defend, but spins away just he comes forward
tossed up outside off, tries to defend but gets an outside edge wide of point for a couple
flighted outside off stump, defended on the front foot
flatter outside off and spinning away, pushed to cover
tossed up on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, defended
short and wide outside off, cut away to third man
short of a length outside off, opens the face to guide it to third man for a single
back of a length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler off the back foot

good length on middle and leg, swinging away just a touch, Price gets on the back foot to defend, misses, and is struck high on the pads. The appeal is turned down as the umpire thinks it was a touch too high
much needed runs for Zinbabwe here! that was wide down the leg side and swinging further down, Sangakkara dives to his left but fails to get his gloves to it, runs down the fine leg boundary
short of a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
flighted outside the off stump, pitches on a full length, defended
full toss on leg stump, swept away to fine leg
flatter on the off stump and spinning into Price, defended back to the bowler
beaten by one that held its line, pitched full outside off, Price plays inside the line to that one expecting it to spin into him, misses as the ball goes straight on
flighted on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
tossed up outside off, tries to defend but gets an outside edge to short-third man
back of a length outside off and swinging in, pushed to point off the back foot

back of a length on middle and leg, worked away to square leg, Ray Price is halfway down the pitch with no response from Williams, the fielder at square leg throws it to the wrong end and Price has enough time to make it back
good length on the off stump, driven to the off side, no run there

short of a length on middle stump, pulled away in front of square, over mid on, where Maharoof chases but cannot prevent the batsmen from taking three. Maharoof struggling there, he seems to have injured his knee there, nothing serious though, he's back on his feet
good length on the off stump, dropped wide of the leg umpire for a quick couple
full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
tossed up on leg stump and spinning into the left hander, short of a good length, defended onto the off side
flighted on the off stump and spins away, Williams tries to defend but the ball evades the outside edge at just the last moment, Sangakkara appeals for a caught behind but it's turned down
flighted on middle and off, defended on the off side
pitches outside leg stump and spins towards middle, played to point
pitches on middle and held its line, cut away to point, although the ball wasn't quite there to play that shot
flighted on the off stump, defended on the front foot
short of a good length outside off, Price tries to play at it, but backs out at the last moment
fuller outside off, defended on the front foot

gone!! that was pitched on a good length outside off and angling away, Price has a lethargic prod at it, gets the outside edge and Jayawardene at first slip takes a good catch diving forward and to his left. Eight down now!
full on middle and leg, driven straight to mid on
back of a length on middle and leg, played wide of square leg for a single
short of a good length on middle, Williams gets on the back foot and opens the face to guide the ball straight to point
tossed up on middle and spinning down leg, tries to defend on the front foot, hit on the pads
bowled flat on the off stump from round the wicket, tries to defend on the front foot with bat close to pad, gets an thin inside edge
flighted on middle and spinning down leg, defended with the pads yet again.
flighted on middle and leg and spinning down, struck on the pads, Aleem Dar shakes his head yet again
tossed up on middle and leg, driven straight to mid on
tossed up outside off, Mupariwa has a wild swing at that one, gets an inside edge onto his pads
flighted outside leg stump, full, swept to fine leg

pitches on a good length on the off stump and spinning in, Mupariwa gets on his knees and tries to sweep that fine, deflects off the glove and the ball lobs in the air and over the keeper, Jayawardene at first slip runs a few steps to his left to take an easy catch. Mendis strikes immediately
flighted outside off stump, swept to deep square leg
flighted on the off stump and spinning away, Williams tries to slog-sweep that one over mid wicket, fails to connect
flatter on the off stump, a conventional off spinner, defended on the off side
gone!! all over!! that was flighted on the off stump, Williams planted his foot forward and tried to loft that one over mid on, Maharoof remained alert and ran behind to take a well judged catch

inn2.comm: back of a length outside off, defended to point off the back foot
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
back of a length on middle, turned to mid wicket off the back foot
good length outside the off stump, defended to point off the front foot
back of a length on middle and off, tries to work it away on the leg side, gets a leading edge wide of point for a single
back of a length on middle and leg, flicked to fine leg for a single
full outside off, swung in a touch, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length outside off, tries to push it towards the covers, gets a thick outside edge towards gully
short of a good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
full outside off, Tharanga gets on the front foot and slices that one over cover for a couple
beaten! good length on the off stump and swings at just as Tharanga comes forward to defend, good ball
full on middle and leg, driven straight to mid wicket
full on  middle and off, worked away towards square leg where a diving stop prevents a single
good length on the off stump, defended to point on the front foot
good length on the off and swinging in, dropped onto the on-side short of mid wicket, no run there
back of a length on the off and swinging in, placed between cover and cover-point for a single
back of a length on middle and off, defended on the back foot towards mid wicket
short and wide, tries to cut it towards point, misses, that was a touch too quick for the batsman
full on middle and off, tries to drive it down the ground towards mid on, gets an inside edge that just about manages to evade the leg stump to roll down to fine leg for a single
good length outside the off stump, defended on the front foot
good length outside off, holding its line, left alone to the keeper
short of a good length on leg stump, shuffles across and tries to glance that wide of fine leg, is struck on the thighs but gets two-leg byes
back of a length outside off, punched to cover off the front foot
full on the pads, tries to flick that away towards square leg, misses
full on the pads again, misses an opportunity once more, tries to glance it fine but fails to make contact, hits his pads and drops on the off side
back of a length outside off, chopped down to point
back of a length outside off, looks to cut it away off the back foot, gets an inside edge onto his shoes
good length on the off stump, pushed to mid off
short of a length outside off and swinging away a touch, leaves it alone
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone yet again
full on middle and off and swinging away just a touch, Tharanga gets on the front foot and pushes it firmly wide of mid off for a boundary. That was very well timed
full outside off and angling away, gets on the front foot to defend, gets a thick outside edge wide of a diving point for a single
good length outside off, holding its line, Tharanga has nothing to do with it
fuller on the off stump, pushed off the front foot wide of cover for a quick single
full on the off stump, defended towards mid off
short outside off, there to hit, strikes it over cover, but not well enough, for a couple
good length on middle and leg, turns the face of the bat to work it towards square leg
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
full outside off, driven straight to mid off
full outside off, almost on a yorker length, dug out to cover
short outside off, cut away to third man past a diving gully
fuller outside off, angling away, left alone
good length on the off and swinging in this time, defended off the back foot towards square leg
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
that one came back in, pitched on middle on a good length and swung in, tried to play it onto the off side, gets a thin inside edge towards fine leg
short of a good length outside off, defended
gone!! full outside off and swinging away just a touch, tempting the batsman to go for a drive, Udawatte tries to do exactly that, gets an outside edge and Masakadza at first slip makes no mistake.
again a tempting line outside off, there to drive, but Sangakkara decides to leave it alone
wide down the leg side, pitches outside leg and swings further down
good length on the off stump, left alone
short of a length outside off, kept really low, Sangakkara gets his bat down in time to just chop it to the keeper
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
full on the off stump, driven on the up to mid off
wide outside off and swinging away even further, that wasn't given a wide
back of a length on leg stump, turned off his hips to fine leg for a single
good ball, full outside off, holding its line, thinks of driving it towards mid off, but backs away after realising the length isn't quite right
good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
back of a length on middle and leg, dropped onto the on-side
good length on middle and swinging away, defended on the back foot back to the bowler
good length outside off, holding its line, left alone to the keeper
full outside off, Tharanga gets on the front foot and square-drives it to a squarish third man
pitches on a good length on leg stump, Sangakkara walks down a couple of steps and flicks it over square leg for a couple
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
short of a good length outside off, kept low, tried to cut but could not get his bat down in time
short outside off yet again, cut away uppishly to third man this time
short of a good length outside off and leaving the left hander, left alone
short outside off, cut away wide of third man for a couple
good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
full on middle and off, defended watchfully back to the bowler
good length outside off, hardly any pace on that one, left alone
wide down the leg side, good length outside leg and holding its line
good length on middle and leg, glanced down to fine leg
full outside off, driven wide of cover for a quick single
pitches full outside off, left alone
full outside leg, given a wide, a fumble by Taibu allows the batsman to take a run
good length outside the off and swinging in, left alone
full and wide outside off, goes for an expansive drive over the covers, gets a thick outside edge over second slip to the third man boundary
good length outside off, left alone, swinging away
poor line, straying onto the pads, Sangakkara glances it well wide of the fine-leg fielder for a boundary

runs flowing here! that was full on middle and leg, Sangakkara gets forward and drives that towards mid on, where the fielder makes an absolute mess of it to allow the ball to roll down the long on- boundary
good length outside the off stump, Sangakkara shoulders arms to that one
fuller outside off and swinging away, left alone
tossed up outside off front round the wicket, driven straight to cover
much flatter this time outside the off stump, driven straight to cover
flighted outside off and spins away after pitching short of a good length, cut away off the back foot wide of a diving point
flighted on middle and leg, defended
tossed up on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
flatter, and quicker through the air, pitches on the off stump, played back to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
short of a length outside off, guided wide of a diving gully, who gets his fingers to it, for a single to third man
full on the pads, drives it wide of mid on for a couple
beaten! good length bowled at a good pace outside off, swung away after pitching, tries to defend, but didn't anticipate the swing there
good length outside off, left alone this time
short of a good length outside off, shoulders arms
tossed up outside off, pitches on a full length, driven to cover
flighted on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
tossed up on off and spins away, Sangakkara gets forward to defend but that just about escapes the outside edge
flighted on middle and off, driven down the ground to long on
flighted outside off, pushed between cover and point for a single
tossed up on the off stump and spinning away, left alone.
good length outside off and swinging away, left alone
shot! that was full, just slightly outside the off stump, Tharanga plants his foot forward and drives that beautifully wide of a diving mid off for a boundary
pitched short of a good length outside leg stump, walks across to glance it towards fine leg, clips the pads on the way to the keeper
back of a length outside leg stump, flicked away to fine leg
full on middle and off, tries to drive it down towards mid on, gets an inside edge onto his pads
short outside off, Sangakkara wants to finish this off early, tries to cut it over point, gets an outside edge wide of third man for a boundary
shot! that was short of a length outside off, Sangakkara steps down the track and swats that wide of the bowler to the long off boundary
full on middle and leg, pushed wide of mid on for a quick single
That's it! it's all over! that was full on leg stump, whipped away off the pads wide of mid wicket, and Sri Lanka have won this game comprehensively
